Google XXXX Beta

I'm sure that anyone who is now using gmail is familiar with Google's
practise of keeping their offering in "beta" stage for execessively
long periods of time. And in the case of Google Groups moving them back
into "beta". But I'll bet that this is one beta that most people
wouldn't be expecting to see.
